entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
